sentence: In early trading on Wednesday, shares of Verizon Communications ( VZ ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading down 0.4%.
Year to date, Verizon Communications has lost about 3.3% of its value.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Chevron ( CVX ), trading down 4.6%.
Chevron is lower by about 13.6% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are International Business Machines ( IBM ), trading down 4.2%, and Procter & Gamble ( PG ), trading down 0.7% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
